GCSE's should be kept instead of getting rid of them for E-BAC's. Just because students are working a lot harder to get higher grades doesn't mean that exams are getting easier, as a student that has recently done them I am well aware of how hard all students actually find GCSE's and how hard they work towards them. Getting rid of GCSE's for E-BAC's is a very bad choice and perhaps Michael Gove should be replaced with someone that actually has some knowledge of modern education.

I also believe that the exams should become much more coursework based for one huge reason, coursework tests your knowledge of a subject, all that exams do is test how good you are at taking exams they barely test your knowledge of the subject.
